what_you_do: Anton Bluman offers neurofeedback (EEG biofeedback), biofeedback therapy, and counseling as drug-free alternatives using brainwave technology to relieve neurological and mental health conditions.
who_you_serve: Individuals of all ages dealing with anxiety, depression, ADHD, and other neurological conditions.
social_proof: MS, AIBT credentials; licensed counselor; certified in Neurofeedback, Reiki, and Reconnective Healing; 25 years of experience; 5/5 Yelp rating.
business_focus: Providing drug-free neurofeedback and biofeedback therapy to help individuals manage neurological and mental health conditions.
service_provided: neurofeedback therapy, biofeedback therapy, counseling, Reiki, Reconnective Healing
